sql_fill module¶

class sql_fill.sql_fill(user_n, password, database_n)¶

Bases: object

This class establishes SQL connection and contains functions to upload and fetch data from SQL database

__del__()¶

This is a destructor class which closes the connection to the database

None

None

send_email(subject, description)¶

This function sends email to all the subscribers

Parameters:
  • subject (String) – This is subject of the article/email
  • description (String) – This is the description of the article
Returns:
Return type:

None
store_article(image, subject, category, description, id)¶

This function inserts new content into database

Parameters:
  • image (String) – This is the path to image in the article
  • subject (String) – This is the title of the article
  • category (String) – This is the category of the article
  • description (String) – This is the desription of the article
  • id (String) – This is the of the admin inserting the article
Returns:
Return type:

None
